data.comment: The match has started.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo at Morumbí.
In the minute 3, Atletico Mineiro awarded a free kick in their own half.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards the home team a throw-in.
Dani Alves for Sao Paulo drives towards goal at Morumbí. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 6, Ball safe as Sao Paulo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Atletico Mineiro.
Free kick for Sao Paulo in their own half.
In the minute 8, Atletico Mineiro have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Atletico Mineiro awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 9, Sao Paulo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jefferson Savarino (Atletico Mineiro) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Atletico Mineiro drives forward and Eduardo Vargas gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 11, Dani Alves for Sao Paulo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 12, Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards Sao Paulo a goal kick.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Sao Paulo.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Sao Paulo in their own half.
In the minute 14, Sao Paulo have been awarded a corner by Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
Reinaldo of Sao Paulo is pulled up for offside.
Throw-in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 15, Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Sao Paulo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Atletico Mineiro's Allan breaks free at Morumbí. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 16, Ball goes out of play for a Sao Paulo goal kick.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Sao Paulo in their own half.
In the minute 19, Goal kick for Atletico Mineiro at Morumbí.
Sao Paulo's Brenner gets in a shot on goal at Morumbí. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Sao Paulo are pushing forward but Reinaldo's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 19, Atletico Mineiro have a goal kick.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a throw-in for Sao Paulo, close to Atletico Mineiro's area.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a Sao Paulo throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half.
In the minute 22, Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Atletico Mineiro push forward at Morumbí and Keno gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Sao Paulo defence.
In the minute 25, Goal! Igor Gomes gives Sao Paulo a 1-0 lead in Sao Paulo.
Tche Tche instrumental with a fine assist.
Can Sao Paulo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half?
In the minute 28, Corner awarded to Sao Paulo.
Brenner (Sao Paulo) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Sao Paulo.
In the minute 28, Atletico Mineiro pushes forward through Jefferson Savarino, whose finish on goal is saved.
Brenner of Sao Paulo smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro at Morumbí.
In the minute 30, Atletico Mineiro to take a throw-in in Sao Paulo territory.
Keno gets his shot on target but fails to score for Atletico Mineiro.
Sao Paulo's Gabriel Davi Gomes Sara has run offside.
In the minute 33, In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Sao Paulo have a dangerous throw-in.
Can Sao Paulo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Atletico Mineiro's half?
In the minute 35, Atletico Mineiro to take a throw-in in Sao Paulo territory.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
Atletico Mineiro are coming forward and Igor Rabello gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 36, Ball goes out of play for a Sao Paulo goal kick.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo in their own half.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Sao Paulo.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards the home team a throw-in.
Atletico Mineiro awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 41, Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a Sao Paulo throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half.
Guilherme Arana (Atletico Mineiro) gets a yellow card. He will be suspended from the next match!
In the minute 43, Sao Paulo's Dani Alves is on target but unsuccessful.
Sao Paulo have been awarded a corner by Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo at Morumbí.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
The first-half is over at Morumbí.
The second half has started at Morumbí.
In the minute 46, Jorge Sampaoli (Atletico Mineiro) is making a first substitution, with Alan Franco replacing Igor Rabello.
Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
Atletico Mineiro drive upfield and Jefferson Savarino gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Sao Paulo defender.
In the minute 47, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Sao Paulo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half?
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 49, Atletico Mineiro pushes forward through Calebe, whose finish on goal is saved.
Atletico Mineiro's Guilherme Arana gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Sao Paulo defender.
In the minute 50, Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards Atletico Mineiro a goal kick.
Sao Paulo's Brenner is back in action after a slight knock.
Brenner is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In Sao Paulo, Eduardo Vargas of Atletico Mineiro is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 51, Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
Important block from the Sao Paulo defence as Gabriel fires in a strike for Atletico Mineiro.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Sao Paulo in their own half.
In the minute 52, In Sao Paulo Sao Paulo attack through Robert Arboleda. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
Atletico Mineiro's Eduardo Vargas goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
In the minute 54, Free kick Atletico Mineiro.
Eduardo Vargas for Atletico Mineiro is whistled offside.
Throw-in high up the field for Sao Paulo in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 56, Ball safe as Atletico Mineiro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Sao Paulo.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 58, Goal kick for Sao Paulo at Morumbí.
Atletico Mineiro awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 60, Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards the home team a throw-in.
Sao Paulo's Tche Tche gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards Atletico Mineiro a goal kick.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro at Morumbí.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Gabriel Davi Gomes Sara (Sao Paulo) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 63, Sao Paulo have been awarded a corner by Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Free kick for Sao Paulo in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 65, Junior Alonso (Atletico Mineiro) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Important block from the Atletico Mineiro defence as Gabriel Davi Gomes Sara fires in a strike for Sao Paulo.
Throw-in Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 66, Jorge Sampaoli is making the team's second substitution at Morumbí with Eduardo Sasha replacing Calebe.
Allan (Atletico Mineiro) gets a yellow card.
Tche Tche is booked for the home team and will be suspended from the next match.
In the minute 69, Atletico Mineiro drive forward but Keno is judged offside.
Ball safe as Atletico Mineiro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Bruno Alves is booked for the home team.
In the minute 72, Brenner (Sao Paulo) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
In Sao Paulo Atletico Mineiro drive forward through Guilherme Arana. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 74, Atletico Mineiro to take a throw-in in Sao Paulo territory.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a Atletico Mineiro throw-in in Sao Paulo's half.
Sao Paulo's Luan gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 75, Ball goes out of play for a Atletico Mineiro goal kick.
Allan (Atletico Mineiro) has been booked for the second time by the referee and is off!
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Dani Alves.
In the minute 77, Dani Alves for Sao Paulo is back on the field again.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo in their own half.
In the minute 78, Goal kick for Atletico Mineiro at Morumbí.
Federico Zaracho is replacing Jefferson Savarino for Atletico Mineiro at Morumbí.
Sao Paulo are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
The home team have replaced Tche Tche with Vitor Bueno. This is the first substitution made today by Fernando Diniz.
In the minute 81, Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro at Morumbí.
In Sao Paulo, Atletico Mineiro push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Can Atletico Mineiro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sao Paulo's half?
In the minute 83, Goal! Gabriel Davi Gomes Sara extends Sao Paulo's lead to 2-0.
Great play from Vitor Bueno to set up the goal.
The home team have replaced Brenner with Pablo Felipe. This is the second substitution made today by Fernando Diniz.
In the minute 85, Can Atletico Mineiro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sao Paulo's half?
The away team replace Eduardo Vargas with Marrony.
Jorge Sampaoli (Atletico Mineiro) is making a fifth substitution, with Nathan replacing Keno.
In the minute 88, Eduardo Sasha for Atletico Mineiro gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Sao Paulo have a goal kick.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards the away team a throw-in.
Jonas Toro is replacing Igor Gomes for the home team.
In the minute 89, Fernando Diniz is making the team's fourth substitution at Morumbí with Hernanes replacing Gabriel Davi Gomes Sara.
Throw-in Atletico Mineiro.
At Morumbí the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Sao Paulo.
Full-time! The final score is 3-0.
It's now 3-0 in Sao Paulo as Jonas Toro scores for Sao Paulo.
Luan with an assist there.
